                  beep_init PROC
;;;33     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;34     void beep_init(long zvuk,char fl) 
000048  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;35     {
;;;36     if(fl=='O')
;;;37     	{
;;;38     	beep_stat_temp=zvuk;

;;;39     	beep_stat=0x0L;

;;;40     	beep_stat_cnt=32;

000054  6050              STR      r0,[r2,#4]            ;38  ; beep_stat_temp
000056  6094              STR      r4,[r2,#8]            ;39  ; beep_stat
000058  7053              STRB     r3,[r2,#1]
;;;41     	} 
;;;42     else if(fl=='A')
;;;43     	{
;;;44     	beep_stat_temp=zvuk;
;;;45     	beep_stat=zvuk;
;;;46     	beep_stat_cnt=32;
;;;47     	}	 
;;;48     
;;;49     else if(fl=='R')
;;;50     	{
;;;51     	beep_stat=zvuk;
;;;52     	}	
;;;53     		          
;;;54     else if(fl=='S')
;;;55     	{
;;;56     	beep_stat_temp=0x0L;
;;;57     	beep_stat=0x0L;
;;;58     	beep_stat_cnt=32;
;;;59     	}	
;;;60     }
